dataTemplate.name: XXPASPAS
dataTemplate.description: OD PB SC Pre Audit Status Report

dataQuery.sqlStatement: select od_sc_vendor_name, od_sc_vend_type, od_sc_audit_agent, od_sc_factory_name, od_sc_europe_rgn, od_sc_mexico_region, od_sc_asia_region, od_sc_department, od_sc_product, od_sc_audit_required, od_sc_vend_region, od_sc_cnt_of_orgn, od_sc_lead_auditor, od_sc_auditor, od_sc_preaudt_sched_d PreAudit_sched, od_sc_preaudt_result PreAudit_result, od_sc_zt_status PreAudit_CAP, od_sc_zt_aprvl_d PreAudit_Apr_date, od_sc_zt_approver PreAudit_Approver, od_sc_fzt_approver PreAudit_FApprover, od_sc_fzt_aprvl_d PreAudit_FApr_date, od_sc_preaudit_comments comments from Q_OD_PB_SC_VENDOR_MASTER_V where od_sc_fzt_aprvl_d IS NULL AND NVL(od_sc_audit_agent,'X')=NVL(:p_agent,NVL(od_sc_audit_agent,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_lead_auditor,'X')=NVL(:p_auditor,NVL(od_sc_lead_auditor,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_vend_region,'X')=NVL(:p_us_rgn,NVL(od_sc_vend_region,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_europe_rgn,'X')=NVL(:p_eu_rgn,NVL(od_sc_europe_rgn,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_mexico_region,'X')=NVL(:p_mx_rgn,NVL(od_sc_mexico_region,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_asia_region,'X')=NVL(:p_as_rgn,NVL(od_sc_asia_region,'X')) ORDER BY 1,2
